price: 6. Waxaanu ku qurxinnay samada soke qurux xiddigaha ah3.
arabic: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلۡكَوَاكِبِ
footnotes: 3. Xiddigaha waxaa loo abuuray seddex waxyaalood: in lagu gano shayaadiinta, in lagu tilmaan qaato oo lagu garto jihooyinka iyo qurux ahaan samada soke.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innā zayyannā al-samāa al-dun'yā bizīnatin al-kawākibi
